en: I am limited to providing comments in product reviews because there isn't currently an official Amazon feedback route

zh: 1. 在 3 月 29 号，通过预购途径使用 31 元购买了此书，显示 3 月 31 号会推送到设备上，此时亚马逊官网上还无法预览该书（因为还未发布）；
en: 1. I bought the book for 31 yuan through the pre-order channel on March 29, and it says it would be delivered to my device on March 31, the book cannot be previewed on Amazon's official website at this moment (since it has not yet been released);

zh: 2. 3 月 31 号推送到设备上的书，内容是空白，只有敬请期待，而亚马逊上该书电子版降价到了 18 元；
en: 2. The price of the book's electronic version on Amazon has been lowered to 18 yuan, and the content of the book that was pushed to the device on March 31 is blank;

zh: 3. 这两天反复尝试将设备上的下载的空白的书进行删除，再次同步，都无法获取到包含实际内容的电子版《商业的本质》，但是看到亚马逊官网已经可以预览该书。
en: 3. I have tried several times over the past two days to remove the downloaded blank book from the device and synchronize it again, but I am unable to download "The Essence of Business" in its entirety, however, I can see that the book can be previewed on Amazon's official website.

zh: 目前我有几点感想
en: So far, I have a few ideas

zh: 1. 价格的问题其实并不是最重要的，关键是现在怎么将kindle上空白的书换成有实际内容的书，而不是永远下载下来都是“敬请期待”
en: 1. The price issue is not the most crucial one, the trick is to figure out how to swap out the empty books on Kindle with books that have actual substance rather than just downloading them indefinitely and saying "stay tuned"

zh: 2. 预购的书以后应该不会再买了，毕竟万一跳票，再下载一本空内容的书，手续看起来非常复杂；
en: 2. The book that was preordered shouldn't be purchased again in the future, after all, the process appears to be exceedingly difficult if the ticket is bypassed, followed by the download of a book with no content;

zh: 3. 希望亚马逊给到一个可以反馈此类问题的正常渠道，当对电子书下载、或者使用提出疑义的时候可以有地方反馈（工单、线上客服都可以，可以参考微软官方商城是怎么做的）
en: 3. I'm hoping that Amazon will make a regular channel available for input on these problems, there will be a place to provide feedback when there are questions concerning the download or use of e-books (you can refer to Microsoft's official mall for instructions on how to do so through work orders or online customer care, both of which are appropriate)

zh: 不是很推荐阅读
en: Reading is not highly advised

zh: 很久前读的，恰巧看见了凭记忆写点读后感吧。
en: I happened to notice it because I read about it a long time ago, so I'll just write from memory.

zh: 这本书与其说是短篇小说集，不如说是生活中关于爱情的碎片收集。
en: This book is more of a collection of fragments about love in life than it is a compilation of short stories.

zh: 本书的笔调极其平淡，是那种白开水一样的平淡，遣词造句对简约追求到了极致，情节也是像夏日午后的大街一样，寂静平淡。
en: The plot of this novel is as quiet and flat as a street in the middle of a summer afternoon, the tone of the book is similar to that of plain water, and the words and sentences used strive for the utmost simplicity.

zh: 每一个短篇都是平凡生活中的一小段时间的剪影，没有开头，没有结局。
en: Each short narrative is a snapshot of a moment in everyday life that has no beginning or end.

zh: 最后收集在一起，冠名《当我们谈论爱情时我们在谈论什么》。
en: In the end, they were compiled under the heading "What We Talk About When We Talk About Love."

zh: 我想，这个小说集，以及它的标题，像是一种行为艺术，作者想表达的是，爱情不止是舞台上的悲欢离合，都市传说中的海枯石烂，也不只是你侬我侬的如胶似漆，爱情不止是以上也不应该被以上代表，爱情也是平淡如水的生活，枯燥无味的日复一日，也有对生活的无措，现实的逃避，未来的茫然。
en: I consider the title of this anthology of novels to be a type of performance art, the author aims to convey that love is more than only the emotions experienced on stage, the rocks and dry sea in urban tales, and the bond that binds you and I together, not only should the aforementioned not be seen as a representation of love, but also of a life that is dull day in and day out, as plain as water, with a loss of life, denial of reality, and uncertainty about the future.

zh: 阅读这本书时你脑海里可能回想起你身旁吵架的夫妻，认识的人的索然无味的婚姻，以及不如意的感情。
en: While you read this book, images of the quarreling couples around you, the uninteresting marriages of individuals you know, and the unsatisfying relationships can be running through your head.

zh: 这正是我不推荐阅读的原因，从审美的角度上讲，本书的文笔和情节都索然无味，除非你的生活惊涛骇浪或者甜蜜得如生活在糖果城堡，否则你得阅读时的感觉就是见怪不怪和无聊。
en: Since the writing and plot of this book are dull from an artistic standpoint, I do not advocate reading it, unless your life is difficult or sweet, like living in a candy castle, you will feel uncomfortable when you are forced to read it, not strange and dull.

zh: 而从思想深度上，日常情节并没有让人眼前一亮或者扩展一个人的思路和视野（这点不同于马尔克斯的《霍乱时期的爱情》），短暂的片段也没有探讨任何问题，比如是什么样的错误导致了爱情的失败？
en: In contrast to Marquez's "Love in the Time of Cholera," the daily narratives did not engage viewers or broaden their perspectives in terms of depth of thought, and the brief clips did not address any issues, such as What type of error caused the failure of love?

zh: 主角婚姻的破裂来源于那些原因？
en: What led to the marriage of the main character's failure?

zh: 所以我不推荐阅读这本书，读不读都没什么太大意义。
en: Because this book doesn't make much sense whether you read it or not, I do not suggest reading it.

zh: 作者的想法更多地通过技巧和体裁表达而不是故事情节，也是本书阅读体验比较差的原因。
en: This book's reading experience is generally subpar since the author's thoughts are conveyed more effectively through technique and genre than through a clear narrative.

zh: 适合粗读,不能细看。
en: It is appropriate for skimming, not for close reading.

zh: 本书的逻辑性很好,但是内容不够丰满。
en: This book's logic is sound, but it lacks sufficient content.

zh: 解释了很多销售理论是什么、为什么,但在怎么办方面却很薄弱,只是指出了方向但是没有给出具体的做法。
en: It provides an explanation of what and why numerous sales philosophies exist, However, it is lacking in practical advice, it does not offer any concrete solutions; it only indicates the direction.

zh: 另外,本书感觉像是拼凑而成。
en: Furthermore, the book feels like a patchwork.

zh: 举例既有国内的又有国外的;既有知名企业家或销售员又有名不见经传的人。
en: There are both domestic and foreign entrepreneurs or salespeople, for example, as well as unknown individuals.

zh: 不知道是不是为了举例而编纂的故事，如果举一些作者亲历的案例会更有信服力。
en: I'm not sure if it's fiction compiled for the sake of illustration, but it would be more believable if certain cases experienced by the author were provided.

zh: 在顾客还是客户的称谓上变来变去。
en: We modify the title of customer or client.

zh: 标题上还是顾客,正文中就变成客户了。
en: The text becomes a customer, but the title continues to be a client.

zh: 电子书中还出现了错别字、标点符号缺失、编号错误的问题。
en: The e-book also contained errors, missing punctuation marks, and improper numbers.

zh: 总之,这本书作为理论入门是个不错的选择,但对于已经从事销售工作想要提高销售水平的人就不太适用了。
en: In essence, while this book is a fantastic introduction to theory, it is not appropriate for individuals who are currently in sales and want to enhance their sales level.

zh: 快速了解互联网金融的导读书
en: Understand the Internet financial guidebook quickly

zh: 这本书很浅，可以说只是一个入门课，可以帮助大家快速了解互联网金融的全貌，但要深入了解，还是要按图索骥，自己去深挖。
en: This book is quite brief, you could say that it serves only as an introduction to Internet finance, if you want to grasp it in depth, however, you will still need to follow the road map and do some independent research.

zh: 且成书时间较早，后来的支付宝微信借补贴大战培养用户习惯的内容还没提及，如今的第三方支付份额只怕已不是书中所说的占比这么小了吧。
en: Because the book was written earlier, it does not include information about Alipay and WeChat's subsidy war to shape user habits, the third-party payment share in use today is most likely not as low as the book claimed.

zh: 现在好多人外出吃饭都是带个手机就好，商家也因为银行流水太高的原因，弃用银联了。
en: Because the book was written earlier, it does not include information about Alipay and WeChat's subsidy war to shape user habits, the third-party payment share in use today is most likely not as low as the book claimed.

zh: 但还是非常感谢作者写出这本入门书，看得出作者起码有多年的金融观察经验，对国内外的金融发展史都十分熟悉，所以才能写成如此通俗易懂的内容。
en: However, I am quite appreciative to the author for penning this introduction, it is evident that the author has at least years of experience in financial observation and is well-versed in both domestic and international financial development history, as evidenced by the fact that he is able to produce such comprehensible information.

zh: 写高大空很容易，难的是写的通俗易懂。
en: Tall and meaningless writing is simple to do, but writing in an understandable manner is difficult.

zh: 欣赏你，更想让你知道！
en: I value you and wish to tell you more!

zh: 决定一个人工作满意度的第一要素不是薪水高低，而是在工作中是否得到了足够重视和赏识。
en: Not the amount of pay, but rather whether or not a person feels valued and given enough attention at work, is the primary determinant of job happiness.

zh: 根据马斯洛需求层次理论，在人的基本生存需要得到满足后，最迫切的就是心理需要的满足——希望被理解、被肯定、被赏识。
en: Maslow's hierarchy of needs theory states that when people's basic needs for survival are met, it is imperative to meet their psychological needs-- in order to feel understood, validated, and valued.

zh: 确实，对于国人来说，大部分是“爱你在心口难开”，即便是怀有爱、感激与赞赏也是默默放在心里不会说出来。
en: In fact, the majority of Chinese people are "I love you hard to express" people who will keep their feelings of adoration, thanks, and appreciation to themselves and refrain from expressing them out loud.

zh: 作者在本书中阐述了五种赞赏的语言：肯定的言辞、精心时刻、服务的行为、称心的礼物、身体接触。
en: The author of this book explains the five languages of appreciation: physical touch, words of affirmation, acts of service, quality time, and desirable gifts.

zh: 我觉得重要的不是你知道赞赏的五种语言到底是什么，而是你能随时随地发自内心地用这五种语言去赞赏，去感恩身边的人，不管是家人，朋友还是同事。
en: Not knowing the five languages of appreciation, in my opinion, is more significant than being able to express appreciation and gratitude to those around you whenever and wherever you are, whether they be close friends, family members, or coworkers.

zh: 其实越是亲密的人越需要赞赏和感恩，这样我们的生活才会变得更加美好。
en: In fact, the closer individuals are to us, the more we need to show them respect and appreciation for them, in order for our lives to improve.

zh: 学会赞赏，企业也能在一定程度上挽留住人才，降低辞职率。
en: Recognize your worth so that you can help businesses keep people on board longer and cut down on turnover.

zh: 感谢译者给我们带来了精彩的国外的思想和世界。
en: We are grateful to the translator for introducing us to such amazing foreign ideas and cultures.

zh: 由于中西方文化背景等原因，语言之间或多或少会存在差异，如果有机会能看到作者原版相信会收获更多。
en: There are more or less linguistic distinctions,, because of factors like the cultural backgrounds of Chinese and Western people, I think you will learn more if you have the chance to see the author's original work.

zh: 再次谢谢作者和译者以及编辑们的辛勤劳动！
en: Once more, I'd want to thank the authors, translators, and editors for their labor of love!

zh: 疑为伪劣商品，请亚马逊严格审核
en: Please conduct a thorough review, of suspected counterfeit goods by Amazon

zh: 质量超级差，包装松垮，没有分量，甚至不如路边地摊产品，没有克重，没有条码，十袋包装也是松松垮垮，完全不是合格产品的特征；是亚马逊最糟糕的购物体验，已经申请退货；完全属于质量问题；建议商家擦亮眼睛，拒绝劣质货；补充：又买了心相印，超市23元/10卷，加了几张对比照片，进一步验证了该产品的伪劣，为了给消费者更明确的参考，避免经济损失和进一步的心情不快！
en: The quality is extremely poor, the packaging is loose, there is no weight, it is not even as good as street stall products, there is no weight, there is no barcode, and the ten-bag packaging is also loose, which is not a characteristic of qualified products at all; it is the worst shopping experience I have ever had on Amazon, and I have requested a return, it is entirely a quality issue; traders should retain an open mind and shun substandard goods, supplement: I purchased a heart-to-heart, 23 yuan/10 roll from a supermarket and attached a few comparison photographs to confirm the product's authenticity, clearer references to avoid financial loss and more dissatisfaction!

zh: 再度期望亚马逊能够一丝不苟，严把商品源头。
en: Once more, I anticipate that Amazon will be very careful and cautious about the origin of the products.

zh: 马马虎虎的产品，和期望有差距
en: A gap exists between expectations and shoddy products

zh: 优点：
en: Benefits:

zh: 1. 大品牌，价格便宜。
en: 1. A well-known brand, affordable price.

zh: 优点2：电机和刀片都是PANASONIC保证的，使用起来也还OK，但是和我期望有差距。
en: Benefit 2: PANASONIC guarantees the motor and blade, and it is safe to use, however, it falls short of my expectations.

zh: 缺点：
en: Disadvantages:

zh: 1. 充电没有指示灯，这个最基本你的电源指示都省下了，估计购买300元产品的客户，在松下PANASONIC的眼里，也是施舍，毫无尊重。
en: 1. Because there is no indicator light for charging, your power indicator is essentially preserved, according to estimates, PANASONIC considers customers who purchase goods worth 300 yuan to be disrespectful and giving.

zh: 2. 有强烈的异味 充电时候，哪怕仅仅充电10分钟，就可以闻到强烈的塑胶燃烧的那种味道。
en: 2. There is a powerful smell, even after only 10 minutes of charging, you can smell the pungent odor of burning plastic.

zh: 办公室试用了1天，搞的全屋子都是这种塑胶味道。
en: I gave it a try for 1 day in the office, and the entire place smelled like plastic.

zh: 和我之前用过的同价位的飞利浦PHILIPS相比，虽然多了个刀头，但是松下这款产品，质量真是对不起消费者了。
en: Although there is an additional cutter head compared to the PHILIPS of the same price I previously used, the quality of this Panasonic product is truly regrettable for customers.

zh: 小包装
en: Little Package

zh: 收到快递一看上面写着电商版就知道又掉坑里了，比超市买的小了好些，应该是M，跟商品介绍上面的图片包装不一样，所谓新版吧。
en: I knew it had fallen down the hole once more when I opened the express delivery and saw the e-commerce version, compared to the supermarket version, it was smaller, it ought to be M, in contrast to the product introduction picture, the package is different, the allegedly new version, the so-named new edition.

zh: 三颗星是怪自己马虎没看清楚商品规格，你卖M码电商版我没意见，你货不对版是几个意思？
en: I only gave it three stars because I was careless and didn't carefully read the product details, I have no issue with you offering the M-size online version for sale, what does it signify that the edition of your product is incorrect?

zh: 电商套路深，有时间还是去超市买了。
en: Since e-commerce processes are complex, I still go to the grocery store to make purchases when I have time.

zh: 就酱紫。
en: The sauce alone.

zh: 味道不喜欢
en: Dislike the flavor

zh: 小孩很不喜欢牙膏的味道，每次都说辣，也许用别的词形容才更贴切，小孩的词库里暂时只有这个词。
en: The kid doesn't particularly enjoy the flavor of toothpaste, and always claims it's spicy, perhaps a different word would be more suited to describe it, currently the child's vocabulary consists of just this one word.

zh: 搞活动时候买的，很便宜，所以也不好意思给差评了，四星吧，不过不会再买了。
en: I am ashamed of leaving a negative review, maybe four stars, but I won't purchase it again because I purchased it at an event and it was extremely inexpensive.

zh: 正品哟 包装好
en: Sincere yo, attractive packaging

zh: 包装很完整，里面加了充气袋，没有网上评论的只有光秃秃一个产品的样子。
en: There are no internet reviews, merely a bare product, and the packaging is very thorough, with an air bag inside.

zh: 瓶子外包装上还有一层塑料膜像图片上描述的一样，快递也很快，拍下第二天就来了。
en: There is still a coating of plastic film on the bottle's outside packing, as shown in the photograph, and the express shipping is also very swift, arriving the next day after I took the photo.

zh: 是正品，只是没货了，不知道什么时候再上架。
en: It's authentic, but it's out of stock, and I'm not sure when it'll come back.

zh: 糟心的一次购物体验
en: A poor shopping encounter

zh: 黑五的时候下的单，结果等了好久都没收到，后面一查询，包裹早已被签收，问了身边的同事都说没有帮签收，赶紧联系快递公司，却说要寄件方才能发起查询，联系了亚马逊客服，又等了十多天，终于搞清楚是快递被误投给别人了，又几番周转才终于取回快递，外包装已经被拆，商品还算是完整，也不知道被用过没有，总之挺糟心的
en: I ordered on Black Friday, but despite waiting a long time, I never got the item, the box had already been signed for when I checked it later, my coworkers denied signing for it when I questioned them about it, I called the courier service right away, but they told the sender should make the inquiry, over ten days passed after I contacted Amazon customer service, the messenger was inadvertently sent to someone else, I finally realized, I eventually recovered the courier after a few rounds, the product is still intact despite the removal of the outer packing, I'm not sure if it was ever used, No, it's still fairly horrible

zh: 错误的配图
en: Wrong photo

zh: 我以为自己能够收到图1这样的耳机，没想到却收到了图2这样的耳机，图物不一致也就算了，耳机左右声音大小不一又是什么意思？
en: I expected to get a headset similar to Figure 1, but instead I got a headset like Figure 2, the visuals being inconsistent is acceptable, but what does it imply that the volume on the left and right earbuds differ?

zh: 虽然名称都是一样的，但还是希望大家能够小心注意，另外还请亚马逊负责人及时更换正确的配图，万分感谢。
en: Despite the fact that the names are the same, I still hope that everyone will pay attention, to add, I also request that the Amazon administrator quickly replaces the appropriate image, I appreciate you.

zh: 操作系统一般般
en: Moderate operating system

zh: 用了一段时间，总体来说画面还可以，感觉不出什么差别来，就是这个系统让人看着纠结，开机时间明显有点慢，也没法进行很好的设置，再带的软件更是不用评论了，响应速度那就更一般了，和同事家的比起来那不是一个数量级的。
en: After using it for a while, I can't really see the difference, but overall the picture is not horrible, however this system makes people look jumbled, boots up slowly, I can't make proper settings, and the software I bring is not required, when compared to my colleagues' responses, the response time is not significantly slower after commenting.

zh: 看评论说很人性化的设计，我没有找到哪里人性化，遥控器这个常用的上下左右，返回键设计的位置实在是不敢恭维。
en: Although it is described as having a very user-friendly design in the comments, I couldn't discover any examples of a human-friendly design, Up, down, left, and right are the often utilized remote control directions, and the back button's placement is actually not very attractive.

zh: 所以呢，就当个电视吧，再外加电视盒之类的用吧。
en: So, just utilize it as a TV, and use a TV box or something similar.

zh: 降价太厉害了
en: The price cut is too substantial

zh: 降价太厉害了，一百多入现在99！
en: More than 100 yuan is now only 99, a too-strong price reduction!

zh: 在亚马逊积累了很多未评价的订单，所以我统一用复制的一段话作为评价内容。
en: I have a ton of unreviewed orders on Amazon, so I use a paraphrased passage as the evaluation content.

zh: 如果我用这段话来评价，说明这款产品至少85分以上。
en: If I evaluate based on this section, it indicates that the product has at least 85 points or higher.

zh: 而比较差的产品，我绝对不会偷懒到复制粘贴评价，这样其他消费者在购买的时候会作为参考，而商家也会因此改进商品质量。
en: If a product is subpar, I will never be so lazy to copy and paste reviews so that future customers can use them as a guide when making a purchase and the seller can raise the standard of the product as a result.

zh: 低价好线，不发烧就这个够了！
en: If you don't have a fever, this is plenty given the low price and good line

zh: 这么便宜的线，但是却应该是达到了hdmi认证标准的，亲身对比秒杀国内秋叶原这些狗屁玩意（价格都是贵一倍了），线身粗壮，也比较柔软，7米传输没有噪点，以后低价线认准倍思了！
en: Despite being so inexpensive, the cable should have met the requirements for HDMI certification, the cable body is thick and supple, and the transmission across the 7-meter distance is noise-free when compared to domestic Akihabara rubbish (which costs twice as much), In the future, keep an eye out for Baseus' low price line!

zh: 东西还可以，但是亚马逊的售后服务真的比其他网站差太多了
en: Things are fine, but Amazon's customer service is significantly inferior to that of competing websites

zh: 下单后发现下错了，但是取消订单已经取消不了，网页联系在线客服一直显示错误链接，联系不上。
en: I realized my error after I placed the order, but I am unable to cancel it, the incorrect link was always presented when I tried to contact the website's online customer support, so I was unable to do so.

zh: 到货后送货员给我打电话，我说我不要了，想取消订单的没取消成功，派送员就拿回去了，说先给我签收上，让我申请退货。
en: The delivery person contacted me after the package had been delivered, and I informed him that I no longer wanted it, when I tried to cancel an order but it was not accepted, the delivery man carried it back and asked me to sign for it before letting me request for a return.

zh: 申请退货时才告知食品类一旦签收不能退货，没办法打电话给亚马逊客服，也是一样说法，签收不能退货。
en: I was informed that after the food is signed for, it cannot be returned and that there is no way to contact Amazon customer service when I requested a refund, likewise, the sign cannot be exchanged in this situation.

zh: 我以前在京东和苏宁都买过政策上不能退货的物品，包括牛奶、纸尿裤等，联系客服都给退了，而且京东的纸尿裤打开后味道太大联系客服照样给退了，到了你亚马逊就不行。
en: I have purchased things from Jingdong and Suning, including milk and diapers, that are not returnable in accordance with the rules, when I contacted customer service, they were reimbursed, but Jingdong diapers were excessively pungent after they were opened, the customer support still responded after I called them, when you get to Amazon, you cannot do it.

zh: 规矩是死的，人是活的，联系你们客服，怎么处理的？
en: Rules are no longer valid, people are still living, what should you do? Contact your customer service

zh: 告诉我要么我自己收下，要么让派送员自己买下来，人家派送员本来就不容易了，我凭什么让人家掏钱买下不是自己购买的东西？
en: Tell me I have the option of accepting it personally, or letting the courier make the purchase on his own, why should I let the courier pay for something I didn't buy when it is not easy for the courier?

zh: 行，我也不退了，我自己收下了，但是必须给你们的服务打1分
en: Okay, I accept it myself and will not want a refund, but I must give your service 1 point

zh: 劝大家不要白花钱
en: My advice to you is to avoid wasting money

zh: 首先满怀期待购买，觉得都乐品牌的应该不会差到哪里去吧，收到了以后看包装觉得还可以，个头还不错，但是有一盒基本上都是软软的，外表看是看不出来的，要手感，吃到嘴里完全没有味道，寡淡无味，咬开来果肉一圈是暗黄色就是坏了那种，好坏参着卖的，能吃的也就不到三分之一，劝大家不要买，也不便宜，质量太差了！
en: I am eager to purchase it, first and foremost, the Dole brand shouldn't necessarily be awful, in my opinion, I examined the package when I first got it and deemed it adequate, the size is not bad, but there is a box that is essentially soft, which cannot be seen from the outside, to feel tasteless in the mouth after eating, bland and tasteless, the flesh surrounding the bite is dark yellow, that is the kind that is broken, good and bad are sold together, and less than one-third of the edible ones, I would advise against buying anything because it is extremely expensive and of poor quality

zh: 吃一堑长一智，以后再也不在电商买水果了！
en: Never again purchase fruit through online commerce after making this mistake!

zh: 产品防伪标识在哪里
en: Where is the security seal for the product

zh: 瓶子底部一角凹陷的厉害，应该是经历过强烈的撞击才能导致的，从外包装袋看，感觉蹂躏的程度让人揪心，毕竟是食物类的包装太简单了，而且还是属于国际购的，还有没看到什么明显的防伪标识标志，开瓶非常轻松，关键是盖内的一层蜂蜜直接从里面冒出来了，有开口几乎是没有什么粘连性，外国产品都是这样的吗？
en: The bottle's bottom corner is substantially dented, which should be the result of a powerful hit, from the outer packaging bag, it is alarming to see the extent of the damage, after all, despite the food's overly basic packaging, it is nevertheless sold abroad, have you noticed any blatant counterfeit prevention signs? The bottle is really simple to open, the crucial feature is that the honey layer in the top spills out right away, when there is an opening, adhesion is essentially nonexistent, are all imported goods the same?

zh: 生在中国的我有点不理解了。
en: I'm confused, being Chinese by birth.

zh: 应该是正品吧？
en: It ought to be authentic, right?

zh: 还有拍下时提示二十几号到，这个是14号收到的，我第一次在这里海外购，只是把自己的疑惑写下来，或许这都是正常的？
en: When I shot the picture, there was also a notification indicating it would arrive on the 20th, on the 14th, I got this one, this is my first buy from abroad, I simply noted my reservations, perhaps this is typical?

zh: 提货服务有待改进
en: Improved pick-up service is required

zh: 我一共买了5份提货券，在提取时，第一次预约提取3份，结果只寄过来2份，经过多方沟通才确认是漏发、答应后需补发；第二次预约，刚好赶上休息日，网站和微信均无提示需要在工作日预约，造成了不必要的恐慌，建议以后改善。
en: I purchased 5 delivery coupons in total, I had scheduled a time to pick up 3 coupons, but only 2 were delivered when I went to pick them up, after numerous communications, it was determined that they had been overlooked and that new copies of them were required, the second appointment arrived right on schedule, there was unnecessary worry produced because neither the website nor WeChat mentioned the need for an appointment on weekdays on the final rest day, it is advised to get better in the future.

zh: 不错的购物
en: Pleasant shopping

zh: 东西好评！
en: Nice stuff!

zh: 还是比较相信亚马逊自营的东西，现在海外购以后很方便，从国外买回来物流时间比国内也就多几天，不得不说亚马逊海外购到国内的清关能力还是很强的，比走转运要快很多，所以现在很多东西都在海外购上买。
en: I still have faith in Amazon's autonomous products, the shipping period is now only a few days longer than domestic ones, making it incredibly simple to purchase internationally, I must admit that Amazon still has excellent customs clearance capabilities for purchases made outside of China; this is quicker than transshipment, nowadays so many products are bought abroad, which is much faster.

zh: 希望国内商品的质量和价格能够更好一些，很多东西都是国内产的，但是出去转一圈买回来比在国内还便宜，希望改进。
en: I hope that domestic items' quality and cost can improve, even though many items are made domestically, buying them elsewhere rather than in China is more affordable, I want it to get better.

zh: 垃圾
en: Rubbish

zh: 看到这样的包裹，试问大家:觉不觉得是路边的垃圾?
en: I want to question everyone: Do you think this package by the side of the road is trash after seeing it?

zh: 一个塑料易碎的包装，就用一个塑料袋从所谓的德国发过来，这样的包装是负责的吗?
en: From the so-called Germany, a delicate plastic box is sent in a plastic bag, is a package like that accountable?

zh: 我看这样的包装是装垃圾一样的，购买这个产品，包装及其简陋，没有任何防止破损的措施，就一个简单的塑料袋包装，到手后，包裹完全变形了，里面的物品也有破损。
en: This kind of packaging is, in my opinion, packing garbage, when I purchased this item, the packing was quite straightforward, there was nothing in place to stop harm, it was merely a plain plastic bag, when I received it, the contents of the shipment and the entire package were entirely ruined.

zh: 如果我只是碰到一个这样的，我认了，买了几个都是这样子，找亚马逊客服，客服就说可以退，但运费垫付，然后运费以礼品卡的形式返回给我。
en: I will recognize it and purchase a number of these if I only come across one like it, when I contacted Amazon customer service, they informed me that the shipping price may be reimbursed but that it would first need to be paid and would then be given to me in the form of a gift card.

zh: 我试问一下，我用现金支付运费，你们给我返礼品卡，这是要我自己买你们礼品卡就直说啊，还要自己把产品邮寄到德国仓库，这不是买个产品受罪啊!
en: Let me ask you this: I pay the shipping charge in cash; will I receive a gift card in return, As a result, I will need to purchase your gift card on my own, I have to mail the item to the German warehouse, purchasing a thing is not illegal at all!

zh: 而我一直跟客服说，出现这样的问题是谁的责任，客服却半句不说是他们的责任，连半句责任都不敢担当，这样的售后服务还有什么保障呢? 一句话:认栽!但我估计我这个评价，亚马逊都不会给公布的机会，直接回删除!
en: I have been asking the customer support who is accountable for the issue, but they have refused to acknowledge any responsibility and will not even accept it for a single word, what kind of warranty is offered for this type of post-purchase support? Planted! However, I anticipate that Amazon won't allow me a chance to publish my evaluation, so I'll just erase it

zh: 质量很好5星，物流很差

zh: 1，质量很好，秒杀的，价格适中，物超所值。
en: 1, The price is excellent, the quality is really good, and the cost is reasonable.

zh: 2，结实、用料足、焊点牢固、表面处理得当、颜色很好。
en: 2, Sturdy construction, ample material, solid solder joints, appropriate surface finishing, and attractive color.

zh: 3，物流是硬伤，3号下的单，11号到的。
en: 3, The logistics are inefficient, the order was placed on March 3 and was delivered on April 11.

zh: 4，如果亚马逊没有标注预计到货时间是2月7号，我或许会很满意。
en: 4, I might be quite happy if Amazon didn't list February 7th as the estimated arrival date.

zh: 5，但标注了预期到货时间，就相当于给用户一个承诺，当承诺无法兑现的时候，用户很难受。
en: 5, However, indicating the anticipated arrival time equates to making a guarantee to the user, the user will feel quite uneasy if the promise cannot be kept.

zh: 6，如果你没有给予承诺的把握，请不要做出承诺。
en: 6, If you are unsure whether to make a promise, don't make one.

zh: 7，实际上，我非常在意商家做出的承诺。
en: 7, In reality, I am cautious about merchants' promises.

zh: 8，所以，我打了低分。
en: 8, As a result, my grade was dismal.

zh: 效果还是有的，但感觉是否明显，就看个人咯，或是心理作用。
en: The influence is still present, but depending on the person or the psychological effect, the emotion may or may not be noticeable.

zh: 有一点不太好的，就是金色的线，本来设计出来是觉得好看，但实际上，这个金线会掉色，往车上一放，如果拿动几次，手上，和车上，会有一些金粉。
en: The gold thread is one item that is not ideal, although the gold thread was intended to appear attractive, it will eventually deteriorate, there will be some issues in your hands and on the car if you put it on the car and hold it a few times, a little gold dust.

zh: 希望产品可以改进。

zh: 这种方形的，也没啥装饰效果，就不要搞金线上去，掉下来在车上弄脏车还麻烦。
en: Do not attach gold wires to this type of square form because they have no decorative impact and could cause problems if they came off and stained the car.

zh: 东西完好，速度可以，分2个包裹还不同包装
en: The goods are in good shape, and the delivery time is adequate, they come in 2 separate bundles that are broken up differently

zh: 8天的速度蛮快的，但就是2件分了2个包裹，包装还不一样，明显一个防震太多了，厚纸板贴着，封了层塑料，外包装也方便拆，一个就国内的快递盒似的，放了几个缓冲气囊就算事了，感觉有点敷衍。
en: 8 days is a rather quick turnaround time, but it comes in 2 separate shipments for 2 items, and the packing is not the same, one is obviously too shockproof, It is secured with substantial cardboard and covered with plastic, disassembling the outside package is also simple, domestic is the other, It's like a courier box, and adding a few cushioning airbags is acceptable, albeit it feels a little pointless.

en: I immediately fell asleep while lying on it since the quality is excellent, the sleep is quite nice, and it is pretty soft whether it is the front or the back.

en: Due to the rough expedited transportation, there were some stains on the mattress when it was delivered.

zh: 并不是自营商品，亚马逊无耻了

zh: 页面明确标注自营，实际上由供应商配送，售后由供应商负责，出问题自行联系供货商。
en: The self-operated label on the page is very obvious, In actuality, the provider delivers it, and the supplier is in charge of after-sales, make your own contact with the supplier if there is an issue.

zh: 想取消订单，对不起，订单信息已传递给供应商，不能取消；想退换货，在亚马逊成功申请了退换货，对不起，没有人理你，需要自行联系供货商退货。
en: Sorry, but once the order information has been forwarded to the supplier, it cannot be changed, if you want to return the item, and you have successfully requested a return on Amazon, I'm sorry, but nobody is concerned; you must get in touch with the provider on your own to return the item.

zh: 这尼玛哪门子自营商品。
en: This damn self-operating thing. What kind of thing is it?

zh: 商品不是亚马逊配送，售后亚马逊不承担，客服竟然说“我帮你联系供应商”，还声称就是自营，太无耻了，赤裸裸的不要脸，赤裸裸的对消费者进行欺诈！
en: Amazon does not deliver the item, and it also does not assume liability for the after-sale support, even the customer service stated that it was self-operated and said, "I will help you contact the supplier", It is clearly cheating customers and is shameless!

en: My online purchases of filter elements from different businesses have good filtration properties, I use them for an additional day or two without a scale beyond the initial 28 days.

en: Since the quality of items purchased on Amazon can vary, this time consider buying on this side, the first time to buy a cartridge in Amazon does not feel very good, not only is it early to start the scale, but after the cartridge has been used for 28 days, there will be suspended small black carbon powder, I really do not know whether to continue using, or just throw away good, very depressed~

zh: 没有想象的那么好

en: The outward construction is mediocre compared to other plug-in boards I've used in the past, and the internals haven't been taken apart, I hope it matches the store's description, there is no indication of whether each autonomous unit is turned on from the standpoint of usability

zh: 包装破损了，等时间来检验产品的质量。

en: While the box inside appears to be brand-new and the outer wrapping is severely damaged, the manual does not appear to be brand-new, the stock is available, yet the renovations were barely completed in September, I'm hoping it won't be damaged by then, Please elaborate on why numerous customers brought it up, although the wrapper is destroyed, you can handle it carefully, I appreciate it!

zh: 总体不错，有点小问题

en: This is the first water filtration jug I've ever purchased, after reading a few evaluation articles, I decided that LAICA was the most economical option, I installed the filter element after receiving the product and doing so in accordance with the directions, the treated water and raw water will be combined when released from the spout (the raw water tank is not completely sealed).

zh: 用的时候一定要等所有水过滤完再倒出！
en: When using, make sure to let the water finish filtering completely before emptying it!

en: This bead is made in Thailand, but there is no indication of origin, this is two; there is no indication of texture, this is three; I purchased it in the United Kingdom, where clearly each item has a box, here there is only a simple plastic bag, and the beads lack any product logo, where I can determine whether it is true or false, The picture did not remove the side details, the side details and the main style are inconsistent, there is a significant difference, so this is one.

zh: 购买要慎重哦，尤其是买香港出来的东西。

en: I ordered something two days ago, and when I got it today, the price had been dropped by 40 yuan, It took me a while to locate customer support, but once I did, they told me that since I couldn't make up the difference, I could repurchase the item and return it.

en: While not on par with the best King Kong, the quality is respectable, I've seen the pricing in the mall before; it's at least several hundred, King Kong is my first game, and I like it.

en: The item is excellent, and I presented it to my girlfriend, However, I was disappointed that I couldn't receive the quick delivery because I wasn't in Canada at noon, I had to run twice since the shipping company dropped the mail right in the treasure and did not send me a text message to confirm that I could pick up the box.

zh: 不过宝贝确实不错。

en: The small monkey is adorable, and Amazon has excellent savings, the products are shipped directly from the Chow Sang Sang official website, I ordered it the previous evening, and I got it this afternoon, Really quickly.

en: The mail messenger was likewise quite responsible.

zh: 赞！

en: 1 Amazon customer support advises you to not worry if you receive a product with such an issue… we will get in touch with you in around 54 hours.

en: 2 You then get in touch with the customer service team in the middle, who will let you know that a professional will handle this issue, and let you know the outcome.

en: Since you don't know the commissioner's job number and there isn't a direct phone number to call, you'll never make the effort to get in touch with her, She is the only one who can reach you, You can't.

en: Van Dun JEEP (FANDUN JEEP) clothing pays attention to the effective combination of modern information technology and traditional industries, introduces international advanced production equipment, process design and management technology, and builds a domestic first-class clothing production line.

zh: 在生产和服务、质量和品牌、效益和公益等方面保持卓越的追求。
en: Always striving for excellence in production and service, brand and quality, benefit, and public welfare.

zh: 在信息化建设方面，努力提升企业产品流、物流与信息流的速度与效率，使企业在综合管理能力方面得到了加强和提高，整体提升了企业的现代化管理水平。
en: In terms of information construction, efforts have been made to speed up and streamline the flow of products, logistics, and information so that the enterprise has been strengthened and improved in terms of comprehensive management capabilities, and the overall modern management level of the enterprise has improved.

zh: 公司秉持“诚信，和谐、品质、卓越”的经营理念，产品立足国内市场，深受广大客商的青睐。
en: The business adheres to the "integrity, harmony, quality, and excellence" philosophy, Customers favor the products, which are based on the domestic market.

zh: 梵盾吉普服饰，因为年轻，所以自信！
en: Van Dun Jeep attire because it's young and cocky!

zh: 我们竭诚欢迎海内外客商前来合作，共创辉煌！
en: Customers from both home and abroad are cordially invited to work with us and produce greatness together!

zh: 企业精神：积极进取、与时俱进，服务宗旨：客户至上、真诚奉献，企业使命：引领潮流、树立品牌。
en: Entrepreneurial spirit: proactive, adaptable, service purpose: customer-focused, sincere commitment, corporate mission: set the trend, build a brand.

zh: 没拆开过
en: Never been opened

zh: 电池在用。
en: The battery is working.

zh: 很想解剖一下，看看它肚子里到底是什么。
en: I really want to dissect it and see what is in its stomach.

zh: 后来想想，万一拆开后很失望，花那么多钱就太冤了；万一拆开后很满意，再装起来就难了，用着就不爽了。
en: If you think about it afterwards, It would be unreasonable to spend that much money if you were unhappy after disassembling it; on the other hand, if you were satisfied after disassembling it, it would be challenging to rebuild and uncomfortable to use.

zh: 算了，就算索尼用的是好电芯吧。
en: Even though Sony is employing a quality battery cell, forget it.

zh: 至于电量的详细说明，一般人看着心里会发虚。
en: The majority of individuals will feel guilty after reading the in-depth description of the power.

zh: 我还好，长期在手机厂工作过，除了不懂电路外，也算是半个电池工程师了，能顶得住。
en: Fortunately, I have extensive experience working in a manufacturing producing mobile phones, I can be considered to be a half-battery engineer, and I can handle it, aside from the fact that I don't comprehend circuits.

zh: 喜出望外
en: Delighted with the outcome

zh: 买之前心里真的没底，直到打开一看包装就感觉很正！
en: I was pretty apprehensive before I bought it, but after I cracked open the box, I was certain!

zh: 最后当我触碰到耳机线的时候，感觉特别柔韧，质量太好了，迫不及待插到手机上打开qq音乐。
en: The headphone cable was incredibly flexible and of such high quality that when I finally touched it, I couldn't wait to connect it to my phone and launch QQ Music.

zh: 我惊愕了，音质竟然是环绕3D立体！
en: I was astounded to discover that the sound quality was surround 3D!

zh: 我在实体通讯店问过了，差不多的30左右，但绝不是品胜牌子的，是杂牌的，因此说这款品胜虽然27块，但是性价比绝对的值得拥有！
en: I inquired in the actual communication store and was told that it would be around 30 or so, but it is unmistakably not the Pinsent Masons brand; instead, it is a different brand, so even if this Pinsent Masons is 27 yuan, it is well worth the money!

zh: 最差的网购体验
en: Worst experience with online purchasing

zh: 9月28号下单后，系统显示已经发货，结果一直等到10月12号依然没有收到货。
en: The system said that the order had been dispatched after it was placed on September 28, but the products weren't received until October 12.

zh: 查询亚马逊订单状态，卖家没有提供快递单号，查不到订单在哪儿。
en: Look at the Amazon order status, the vendor did not include an express tracking number, thus I am unable to determine the location of the order.

zh: 于是发邮件给卖家问是否能提供快递单号，过了两天一直没有回复。
en: So I emailed the vendor to ask whether I could share the tracking number, but after two days there was still no response.

zh: 无奈之下，打亚马逊客服，客服告诉了卖家的手机号码，我再打电话问店家，打了几次之后，电话通了，被告知快递丢件了，可以立刻再重新发我一个。
en: I dialed Amazon customer support out of desperation, the seller's mobile phone number was provided by customer support, I dialed the shop once more.

zh: 虽然我特别生气，但是由于电脑急需要，所以也就没跟卖家多说，只要立刻发给我就好。
en: Despite my intense rage, I didn't say much to the seller and simply asked for them to deliver the computer over right away because I needed it so badly.

zh: 结果，第二天打电话问，发货了吗？
en: I called the following day to inquire as a result: Has it been shipped?

zh: 卖家说还没，下午才能发。
en: Not yet, according to the vendor; it will be available in the afternoon.

zh: 我下午又打电话问，卖家说一定发，下午五六点之后发货，结果等我晚上七点打电话，电话就没人接了。
en: The seller told me it will be delivered after five or six in the afternoon when I called again in the afternoon, but when I called at seven in the evening, nobody picked up.

zh: 第三天上午我又打，问货发出去了吗？
en: I contacted once more on the morning of the third day and enquired as to whether the things had been dispatched?

zh: 可以告诉我订单号了么？
en: Could you let me know the order number?

zh: 卖家说没发，告诉我要是着急的话让我从别家订货，要是可以等的话下午就发。
en: The vendor claimed he didn't ship it and advised me to get it from another store if I needed it right away, If I could wait, he said, I could send it in the afternoon.

zh: 没办法，从别家下单又要等好久。
en: No way, placing an order from another store takes a lot of time.

zh: 就只能拜托卖家赶紧发货。
en: Just request rapid shipping from the seller.

zh: 终于在无数个电话跟踪之后，我在10月16号收到了电脑。
en: On October 16th, finally, after numerous phone calls, I got the computer.

zh: 至于电脑的质量怎样，我不知道，因为是给别人买的，后期再追加评论吧。
en: I don't know the computer's quality because I purchased it for someone else, but I will post remarks later.

zh: 刚买半年没用几次，现在已经接触不良了，询问可以给修吗？
en: It has a horrible contact presently, despite the fact that I've only had it for six months and haven't used it much, Can I have it fixed?

zh: 因为有台式机，买了之后没怎么用过几次。
en: Since I acquired it, I've occasionally not used it because I have a desktop computer.

zh: 只是出差时装包里带上用几次。
en: I only keep it in my work bag and occasionally utilize it.

zh: 最近发现接通电源时，不充电，需要用手左右扶几下充电器和线的连接处，才能充上电。
en: Recently, it was discovered that it was not charging when the power was turned on, To charge it, you had to repeatedly hold the charger's cable connection in place with your hands.

zh: 怀疑是接口处接触不良，不知道现在还能给修吗？
en: The interface may not be connected properly, according to speculation, can it be fixed right now, I wonder?

zh: 强烈建议亚马逊停用EMS ！
en: It is highly advised that Amazon turn off EMS!

zh: 商品五星，物流一星，平均三星。
en: Three-star average, one-star logistics, five-star product.

zh: 不懂为什么亚马逊要寄EMS，业内公认的不靠谱，好嘛，电脑好歹也是贵重物品啊！
en: Why Amazon wants to dispatch EMS is a mystery to me, its unreliability is acknowledged in the sector, computers are, in any case, valuable!

zh: 买后订单显示，预计20号送达，于是家里人在家等了三天！
en: The family waited at home for three days after placing the order, which states that delivery is anticipated for the 20th!

zh: 从厦门寄到福州，为什么要四五天啊！
en: Why does sending it from Xiamen to Fuzhou take four or five days!

zh: 22号早上查物流终于到福州了，准备开开心心收货，结果，晚上在没收到任何电话、短信的情况下，一查物流，竟然中午就被签收了，还显示的本人签收！
en: I verified the logistics early on February 22nd and eventually made it to Fuzhou, I was happy and prepared to accept the gifts, So without getting any calls or texts, I reviewed the logistics at night!

zh: 我瞬间震惊了！
en: I was startled right away!

zh: 我是谁？我在哪儿？这电脑真是我买的吗？
en: My identity? My location? Have I truly purchased this computer?

zh: 简直怀疑人生了好么！
en: Just questioned life, okay!

zh: 最后跑了一趟代收点才把电脑搬回来。
en: Finally, I returned the machine to the collecting location.

zh: 具体原因简单说就是因为快递小哥把两个单号弄反了，好在件没丢也就算了。
en: The item is fortunately not lost, but specifically because the courier brother just switched the two tracking numbers.

zh: 我强烈建议亚马逊不要用EMS了，以后亚马逊如果用EMS寄的快递，我一定不会再买了。
en: I firmly advise Amazon not to employ EMS, I won't buy it again from Amazon if they start using EMS for rapid shipping in the future.

zh: 货还不错
en: The products are not of poor quality

zh: 首先说一句刚买了几天就发现降价了，差评，本还算不错，性价比高，cpu和显卡足够应付主流网游和相当一部分大型单机了，散热非常好，但屏幕有点漏光(ips屏的通病)，音响质量不太好，硬盘不好(建议自己花点钱加个固态)，昨天拿去售后检测了一下硬件，没有任何问题，自带的win8.1不太好用，建议升级成10，卖家发货很快，各项询问回答的也很快，收到电脑第二天发票就到了，不错，可惜什么赠品都没有。
en: First and foremost, I purchased it a few days ago and discovered that the price had been dropped, the book is not bad, but the price is exorbitant, the CPU and graphics card are sufficient for most online games and a few huge single computers, the heat dissipation is very good, but the screen is a bit light leaking (IPS screen) (Common problems), the audio quality is not very good, and the hard disk is not very good (it is recommended to spend some money to add a solid state), I took it to the after-sales service yesterday to test the hardware, no problem, the built-in win8.1 is not very easy to use, It is recommended to upgrade to 10, The merchant delivered the goods immediately and responded to all inquiries promptly, after obtaining the PC, the invoice arrived the following day, not terrible, but there are no gifts unfortunately.

zh: (顺便提一句买键盘贴膜一定不要去某宝一家叫E酷数码中心的店买，发货慢质量差，产品有问题不退不换，老板还满嘴脏话，特别曝光一下)
en: (By the way, you should not buy keyboard film from a store called E Cool Digital Center in a certain treasure, Delivery is sluggish, and the quality is subpar, the product will not be returned or exchanged if there is an issue with it, the boss is full of curses, allow me to disclose it)

zh: 东西很好，平台官僚依旧
en: The content is excellent, the platform bureaucrats persist

zh: 硬盘质量非常好，性价比绝对高，比香港买还便宜，不急着用和可以忍受物流的话绝对推荐购买。
en: The hard disk's quality is excellent, and the price/performance ratio is excellent, It is less expensive than purchasing in Hong Kong, It is strongly advised to purchase if you are not in a hurry and can tolerate the logistics.

zh: 但不得不说的是亚马逊平台之官僚依旧，与几年前我发誓绝对不用的时候没有改进，你永远查不到实际物流状况，信息永远是几个星期以后送到，永远不能投诉，就是这么官僚！
en: But I must remark that the Amazon platform's bureaucracy remains unchanged, it hasn't improved since I said I'd never use it again a couple years ago, you will never learn the true logistical situation, you can never complain because the information is always supplied after a few weeks, that's all there is to it: bureaucracy!

zh: 货收到几天了，物流信息还是10几天后你将会收到货！
en: It has been a few days after the items were received, and the logistics information indicates that you will receive the goods in 10 days!

zh: 物流不省心
en: Logistics are not cost effective

zh: 送来成这个样子，不仅包装压扁，电器包装也是开的，也不知道有没有调包。
en: When it was delivered in this manner, not only was the packaging flattened, but the packaging of electrical appliances was also opened, I'm not sure if there has been a package update.

zh: FYI
en: FYI

zh: 还没有试用，一贯信赖飞利浦，希望电池寿命比其它牌子要长一些。
en: I haven't used it yet, but I always trust Philips, so I'm hoping the battery life is longer than that of other brands.

zh: 上网查了，可能是进水的通病，而且没有保修。
en: I looked it up online, and it appears to be a regular issue with water ingress, with no warranty.

zh: 郁闷！
en: Depressed!

zh: 现在裹上保鲜膜继续用，不知能用多久？
en: Now wrapped in plastic wrap to be used again, I'm not sure how long it can be used for?

zh: 买到别人拆开过的
en: Purchase the unwrapped products of others

zh: 三百多的机器要一百多的税确实比较高，看现在再六百多心里平衡多了。
en: It is true that a machine costing more than three hundred will pay a tax of over one hundred, observing that it is now over six hundred and so more balanced.

zh: 收到的时候封口胶条状态看着就很不对，像是拆开过，赶紧先拍了照，果然一撕就开了，打开后里面的纸板还有损坏，担心是别人退的，还没到纪念日就赶紧先给老公试试了，结果机器一点电都没有，还好刀头里面没有胡渣，要不大老远的咋退啊！
en: The sealing tape was in very poor shape when I got it, looking like it had been disassembled, I snapped a quick photo, and sure enough, it opened as soon as it was taken off, The cardboard inside was still harmed after being opened, I was concerned that someone else might have returned it, I soon tried it on my spouse on the anniversary, but there was no electricity at all in the machine, fortunately, the cutter head doesn't include any beard stubble, so why not send it back completely?

zh: 好不好用或者短期会不会有什么问题还未知，如前面的评价，缺货时发出的东西确实不靠谱！
en: It is unknown if there will be any immediate issues or if it will be simple to use, the items sent out while they are out of stock are highly unreliable, same as the previous review!

zh: 体验感中偏上水平
en: Intermediate to advanced level of experience

zh: 差不多顶级电动了，有很多种洁牙模式，但是很少人会天天换不同模式刷吧。
en: There are numerous cleaning modes on this virtually premium electric, but few users will switch their brushes between settings every day.

zh: 用了半年没有啥问题，每天刷，差不多1个多星期一冲。
en: It has been used for six months now without any issues, I've been brushing and flushing it every day for more than 1 week.

zh: 刷头配件在亚马逊买同样便宜。
en: On Amazon, brush head accessories are equally affordable.

zh: App有点难用，除了改一下颜色那些，其他貌似兼容的问题是海外版的原因？
en: Except for changing the color, what other ostensibly compatible flaws making the application a little challenging to use are the causes of the international release?

zh: 希望学学大法的。
en: I'd like to study from Dafa.

zh: 性价比很高
en: very economical

zh: 已经使用了3-4次了。
en: I've used it 3-4 times.

zh: 1、包装完好。
en: 1, The packing is undamaged.

zh: 2、使用非常简单，清洗也很方便。
en: 2, It is incredibly simple to use and clean.

zh: 3、完全可以DIY理发，省钱了。
en: 3, Saving money by DIY-ing your haircut is entirely achievable.

zh: 综上，非常成功的一次购买。
en: An excellent purchase, all around.

zh: 有假货
en: There are imitations

zh: 上次买了两包，居然是两种不同的版本，本来包装上左下角的字是绿色的，结果有一包就不是，是白色的字，结果猫猫吃了就拉肚子了。
en: When I most recently purchased two packs, there were actually two distinct models, initially, the lettering on the pack's lower left corner were green, but it turned out that one pack didn't have green words and had white ones instead, after consuming it, the cat experienced diarrhea as a result.

zh: 是亚马逊的货源是假的，还是发货时被员工掉包，我确定不了。
en: I'm not sure, if the product source on Amazon is phony, or if a delivery worker switched it.

zh: 我会再买一次，如果还是假货，我就要找你们相关人士追责了。
en: I will purchase it again, and if it's still a forgery, I'll find you the appropriate individuals to hold it accountable.

zh: 是横杠的！
en: A horizontal bar is what it is!

zh: 亚马逊图片上是斜杠的，结果给我发来是横杠的，这不是骗人吗?
en: Although the Amazon image has cuts, the effect is a horizontal cut, isn't it a lie?

zh: 效果还行
en: The outcome is not poor

zh: 猫猫喜欢吃，这是重点。
en: The idea is that, cats enjoy eating.

zh: 也确实有效果。
en: And it is effective.

zh: 紧、窄，箍脚、磨脚背。
en: Instep grinding, hoop feet, and tight, tiny spaces.

zh: 不推荐。
en: Not suggested.

zh: 1.UN是clarks最舒服的系列，可惜这款太差了。
en: 1. Clarks' UN series is the most comfy, but this particular model is awful.

zh: 追加：今天对比了以前的UN系列鞋垫（鞋扔了垫留着用），材质比以前差了不少，弹性不如以前，透气也不如以前，就是假假的软。
en: Addition: Today I compared the previous UN series insoles (throw away the shoes and save the insoles), and I found that the material is significantly worse than before, the elasticity is lower, and the breathability is lower, it is also counterfeit and soft.

zh: 2.我的脚背不算高，硌的部位在脚背最高处向前3公分左右。
en: 2. My instep is not very high, and the cruciate section is located around 3 cm in front of the instep's highest point.

zh: 3.海外购买了三双clarks，只有一双合适。
en: 3. Only one pair of the three pairs of Clarks I purchased abroad fits.

zh: 吓得我把收藏夹里的其乐都删了。
en: I erased all of the music from my favorites because I was so terrified.

zh: 回头试试rockport，不行只能去ecco实体店了。
en: If Rockport doesn't work, try it again, otherwise you may only visit an actual Ecco store.

zh: 以次充好，品控不好
en: Inadequate, poor quality control

zh: 首先，值得肯定的是Prime海外购Ups很给力，31号下的单6号就收到了。
en: First of all, it is important to stress the strength of Ups' Prime foreign purchasing, which enabled the order to be placed on the 31st and be delivered on the 6th.

zh: 鞋子颜色比图片好看很多，皮质感觉不错。
en: The shoe color is much more vibrant in reality than in the photo, and the leather is comfortable.

zh: 鞋码稍大一点点，25脚长10.5宽拍的7.5W，上脚稍微有点宽松，不过平时就喜欢穿宽松一点，垫一双鞋垫刚好。
en: The shoe size is slightly larger, measuring 25 feet long, 10.5 broad, and 7.5W, the upper foot is a touch loose, but I often prefer to wear looser shoes, and a pair of insoles are perfect.

zh: 其次，这个鞋子品控真的不敢恭维，一只鞋底胶有破损，另外一只鞋面有各种擦痕还有个针眼，鞋面与鞋底连接处胶条错位，明摆着的以次充好！
en: Second, this shoe's quality control is actually not admirable, the rubber on one sole has been damaged, while the other sole's upper has numerous scratches and a pinhole, the rubber strip between the top and the sole is not where it should be!

zh: 有点后悔！
en: I sort of regret it!

zh: 做活动280块买到的，这个价格买到亚瑟士相当划算，当然看评论还有更低的价格。
en: I paid 280 yuan for it for an event, purchasing ASICS at this pricing is a steal, of course, lower pricing can be found in the comments.

zh: 现在说一下鞋子，优点：鞋子很轻，跑步挺舒服，也比较合脚，不会松松垮垮的。
en: Let us now discuss the shoes, Advantages: The sneakers are incredibly light, pleasant for jogging, and fit nicely without being baggy.

zh: 颜值很高但缺点也很明显：我一般穿40的鞋，这次买的40.5的，穿进去鞋子前端大概还有1个大拇指的距离，但是，这并不影响什么。
en: The aesthetic is excellent, but there are some evident drawbacks: I typically wear 40 shoes, but I bought 40.5 shoes this time, and there is roughly 1 thumb's gap from the front of the shoes, but this makes no difference.

zh: 这鞋很“窄”，虽然前面还留着距离，但是感觉紧紧的。
en: This shoe is incredibly "narrow," and despite the fact that there is still some space in the front, it feels tight.

zh: 还有一点，鞋子透气可能不太好，现在穿感觉脚很热。
en: Another point to consider is that the shoes may not be adequately ventilated, and it feels hot to wear them right now.

zh: 压脚背
en: Putting pressure on the instep

zh: 首先鞋子做工很好，值这个价。
en: First and foremost, the shoes' craftsmanship is excellent, and they are well worth the price.

zh: 我的脚是很标准那种，跑鞋uk7.5,eu41.5,皮鞋uk6.5,亚马逊的爱步也买过几双，从来没有出现过不合脚，但是这双我参照评论，买大一号uk7,上脚后因为大了一码长度明显偏长，但因为鞋垫太厚，还是压脚背压的厉害，加上徒步鞋非常硬，导致上脚非常难受。
en: My feet are pretty standard type, running shoes UK7.5, EU41.5, leather shoes UK6.5, Amazon's Aibu also bought a few pairs, there has never been an ill-fitting pair , but for this pair, I referred to the remarks and bought a freshman Size UK7, the length of the upper foot is plainly longer because it is one size larger, but because the insole is too thick, it still presses the rear of the foot very hard, and the hiking shoes are quite harsh, making the top of the foot very uncomfortable.

zh: 如果你的脚不是特别瘦那种，不推荐购买这款。
en: It is not recommended that you acquire this if your feet are not extremely thin.

zh: 如果一定要买，换个鞋垫也能解决，但是原配鞋垫看起来很高级的样子，不用又可惜。
en: You can change the insole if you have to buy it, but the original insole looks really high-end, so it's a shame not to use it.

zh: 非常完美的一次购物！
en: A fantastic buying experience!

zh: 非常满意，非常喜欢，亚马逊海外购都是正品毋庸置疑，质量也非常好，物美价廉，买的放心，售后服务很周到，客服态度都很亲切和蔼，处理问题耐心高效，完美解决后顾之忧，配套的快递送货上门非常便捷稳妥，送货师傅很替顾客着想，每次都会提醒及时从快递柜中取货，感谢亚马逊给顾客提供如此舒适的购物体验。
en: I'm quite pleased with it and enjoy it a lot, there is little doubt that Amazon's overseas purchases are genuine, and the quality is excellent, it is of great quality and reasonably priced, you can be confident that you will be able to purchase it, he after-sales service is excellent, the rapid delivery service is really convenient and secure, and the delivery master is highly mindful to consumers, He will remind you to pick up the things from the express cabinet on schedule every time, thank you Amazon for making shopping so enjoyable for your customers.

zh: 总之，我们全家都喜欢在亚马逊海外购shopping!
en: Overall, our entire family enjoys buying on Amazon from abroad!

zh: 绝对差评！

zh: 虽然说过去很久，但是还是要来吐吐槽。

zh: 冬天秒杀买的，不到200，放在家几个月没用。
en: I paid less than 200 for it in winter spikes, but keeping it at home for a few months is pointless.

zh: 春天要用的时候发现和手环怎么也连不上，两个设备说明书都表示支持对方，后来发现应该是心率带的问题，因为找来其它的设备还是连不上。
en: I discovered that I couldn't connect to the bracelet when I attempted to use it in the spring, the user manuals for both devices endorsed one another, later I discovered that since I was still having trouble connecting to other devices, the issue should have been with the heart rate band.

zh: 打电话亚马逊，让我联系代理公司，代理公司让我自费把设备寄去上海检测。
en: I called Amazon and requested them to put me in touch with the agency, who told me to pay for the shipping of the equipment to Shanghai for testing.

zh: 过了将近半个月，东西被原封原样的寄了回来，连快递盒子都是我寄过去时用的那个！
en: The items were sent back undamaged after almost half a month, even the express box I used to send them over was there!

zh: 没有任何回复和回执以及检测报告！
en: There is no response, acknowledgement or test report!

zh: 你好歹告诉一声，到底是好的还是坏的啊！
en: Tell me at least whether it's nice or awful!

zh: 打电话去问，说这样寄回来表示设备没问题，是好的。
en: When I contacted to inquire, I was informed that sending it back in this manner indicates there is no issue with the apparatus, which is good.

zh: 但是我怎么还是连不上呢，代理公司回答：那就不是他们的事了。
en: The agency responded, "That's not their business," when I asked why I still can't connect.

zh: 算我倒霉，懒得为了个200块的东西被你们折腾。
en: I'm unfortunate because I'm too lazy to be hurled by you for 200 yuan stuff.

zh: 严重货不对板。

zh: 非常货不对板。
en: Extremely low stock.

en: Excellent material for the headband.

zh: 比nike好多了。

zh: 透气性也很好。
en: Breathability is excellent as well.

zh: 只是前面那个帽。

zh: 非常细。
en: Extremely fine.

zh: 是要来逗比的么？！
en: Are you just here for fun? !

zh: 完全遮不到阳光。
en: There is absolutely no sunlight.

zh: 不退货是因为作为头带功能不错。
en: It is not being returned because it makes a good headband.

zh: 向上戴起来虽然遮不了太阳。
en: Even if it doesn't block the sun, wear it upward.

zh: 但跟其他头带款式不同。
en: Nevertheless, distinct from other headband designs.

zh: 留着用。
en: For future use, keep it.

en: The products are of decent quality, Amazon doesn't uphold its end of the bargain, and the delivery person is excellent.

en: Delivery on Saturday and Sunday is not permitted by Amazon's policies.

zh: 害得我，从外地驱车200公里赶回来取货！
en: Caused me to travel 200 kilometers from the field to pick up the supplies!

zh: 亚马逊，我如何再爱你？

zh: 送货员很积极，很热情。
en: The individual who delivered the package was upbeat and enthusiastic.

zh: 给个赞！
en: Make a public announcement!

zh: 商品，简单试了一下，还不错。
en: Commodities, just tried it, and it's not awful.

zh: 但是以前没有买过类似商品，无法比价！
en: However, because I have never purchased identical things, I am unable to compare pricing!

en: Dimensional Logistics

zh: 做工还可以，就是物流太慢了，以前的鞋子什么都是DHL，这次Apex真是...国内买过很多UA，价格都不低，感觉搞的比NIKE ADIDAS档次高？
en: The craftsmanship is good, but the logistics are too slow, the preceding shoes were all sent via DHL, Apex is truly... this time, I bought a lot of UA in China, and the prices are not cheap, isn't the grade greater than NIKE and ADIDAS?

zh: 其实都一样好吧，所以海淘。
en: They are actually all the same, so international shopping.

zh: 尺码：我身高176CM，68KG，我肩膀宽一般衣服都是180的，买的M，下摆略微长，其它穿了正好，我看有推荐S码的，身材那么纤细吗？还是喜欢紧身？我觉得帽衫还是宽松些好。
en: I am 68KG and 176CM tall, 180 is normally how wide my shoulders are, the hem on the M that I purchased is a little longer, others fit perfectly, I see that the S size is advised, Are you really so thin? Or would you rather a snug fit? A loose hoodie, in my opinion, is preferable.

zh: 大小正好
en: The perfect size

zh: 胸围99，身高184，体重84公斤，购买前咨询了客服被告知应该买xxl的，然后看了评论果断入手L的，收货后发现大小正好，差点就被坑了。
en: With a bust size of 99, a height of 184, and a weight of 84 kg, I was advised to get a XXL by customer care before making my purchase, however after reading customer evaluations, I chose to purchase an L, after receiving the item, I discovered that the size was perfect, and I was almost tricked.

zh: 双十一的价格比黑五贵不少。
en: Black Friday is substantially cheaper than Double Eleven in terms of price.

zh: 衣服的质量非常好。
en: The clothing is of excellent quality.

zh: Z实惠的商品问题很麻烦！
en: Z inexpensive goods issue is problematic!

zh: 18号下的单，25日才收到的货，广州到北京蜗牛的速度！
en: On the 18th, the order was placed, and the products arrived on the 25th, from Guangzhou to Beijing, the speed is that of a snail!

zh: 买的是Z实惠的商品，说明中告知有划痕，但是收到货后发现少了4个螺丝及螺母！
en: I purchased Z’s least expensive item, and the description stated that there were scratches, but when I received the item, I discovered that 4 screws and nuts were missing!

zh: 孩子不愿意退货，心想问题不大，但配件这种小零件，孩子爷爷跑了附近几家五金店都没有买到！
en: The kid didn't want to return the item because he didn't believe it was a big deal, but when the kid's grandfather raced to several nearby hardware stores, he was unable to find such tiny accessories!

zh: 最后爷爷给粘上的！
en: Grandpa finally cemented it in place!

zh: 看来以后不能买Z实惠的商品了！
en: Looks like I won't be purchasing Z's reasonably priced stuff in the future!

zh: 玩具加工质量不好
en: Poor manufacturing quality for toys

zh: 螺栓孔大部分都没对齐，上螺栓很费劲，可见加工质量不好，也不知道可以玩多长时间，因為是给孩子许诺的东西，也就不退了。
en: The majority of the bolt holes are out of alignment, making it difficult to put the bolts, the processing quality is poor, as can be observed, and I'm not sure how long it can be played, it will not be returned because the child was promised it in the first place.

zh: 其他评论中说安装不费劲的，难道只有我买的这一件存在问题？
en: Is there a problem with just the one I got when other reviews claim that installation is not difficult?

zh: 很一般
en: Extremely average

zh: 难道是我运气不好？

zh: 包装旧到不行；做工很一般；音乐只有一种而且只有8秒长度然后不断重复；动作就是摇脑袋径自往前走，没任何变化。
en: The packaging is dated, the workmanship is mediocre, there is just one type of music that lasts for only 8 seconds before being replayed, and the action is to shake the head and go on in the same direction with no deviation.

zh: 不值这个价。
en: Cost is not justified.

zh: 急用，就不退货了。
en: Immediately use, not for product return.

zh: 玩具质量不错，吐槽一下包装
en: Although the toy is of good quality, I must criticize the packing

zh: 昨天收到快递，亚马逊买的，标注的是EMS运送，最后是天猫的快递送过来的，这是转了多少个弯？亚马逊和天猫关系还不错？
en: Yesterday, the courier arrived, I ordered it from Amazon, It has an EMS delivery label on it, in the end, a courier from Tmall brought it, how many turns were required? Do Amazon and Tmall still have a good relationship?

zh: 再说一下包装，就是用保鲜膜包了几层，里面连个包装塑料泡泡纸都没有，打开一看，所有的零件就放在空荡荡的盒子里，还好玩具质量不错，没有坏掉的零件，就是比想象中的小太多了，因为不是带电池的，手推着经常脱轨，感觉轨道两边空隙太大，设计不合理。
en: Let's talk about the packaging once more, it's just wrapped in plastic wrap for a few layers, not even a package of plastic bubble wrap inside, when you open it, all the parts are placed in an empty box, fortunately the quality of the toy is good, no broken parts, however, it is much smaller than expected because it is not battery-operated, and it frequently derails when being pushed by hand, I feel that the gap on both sides of the track is too large, and the spacing between the wheels is too wide.

zh: 质量好，好玩
en: High caliber and enjoyable

zh: 很好玩，组件精度很高，做工精致，质量跟乐高差不多了，做活动时价格十分优惠。
en: It is a lot of fun, the parts are extremely precise, the craftsmanship is excellent, the quality is comparable to Lego, and the price is extremely advantageous when engaging in activities.

zh: 拼装的过程挺有趣，我来拼，5岁儿子来玩，挺好。
en: Putting everything together is a fascinating process, my 5 year old son will join me in playing if I do it, very well done.

zh: 他玩得惊笑连连～以后大概会继续买这个牌子的玩具。
en: He laughed and marveled while he played ~ will probably keep purchasing toys from this manufacturer.

zh: 机子新，海淘不错
en: The device is new, and international shopping is good

zh: 圣诞节有看了下，之前买的贵了150块钱，不过现发货比较慢一点。
en: For Christmas, I took a look at it, the one I previously purchased cost 150 yuan more, but the shipping is now a little slower.

zh: 机子还是不错的，都挺新。
en: The equipment is still in fantastic shape and is very new.

zh: 内置的皮卡丘。
en: Integrated Pikachu.

zh: 然后连接精灵球的话会送一个梦幻。
en: After that, if you link the genie ball, a fantasy will be sent.

zh: 玩起来还不错，比ps4，便携性高。
en: It's more portable than a PS4 and not horrible to play.

zh: 已经买了塞尔达，等游戏了，再试一下。
en: Zelda was already purchased, wait for the game, then play.

zh: 生产烂货，出售烂货，结果烂货服务，买了六块手表送孩子的，其中的一快数字显示不完全，六块的时间都不一致，相差十几个小时不等。
en: This was the outcome of the production of defective goods, sale of defective goods, and service of defective goods, six timepieces were purchased to be given to the children, but one of them showed partial numerals, and the time on all six watches varied by more than ten hours.

zh: 我联系厂家问手表在入库有核对时间吗?他们回复说“有”，既然有，那为啥时间相差那么多，那肯定是手表没有精确度，简单地说就是水货产品，不是我说的难听，看嘛，很明显的质量问题（数字显示不完全）都拿出来卖，是不是垃圾货。
en: I contacted the manufacturer and asked if there was a time check on the watch in the warehouse, they replied "yes", since there is, so then why is the time difference so much? That must be because the watch is not accurate, simply put, it is a water product, not what I said, look well, as there are very obvious quality problems (digital display is not complete) and are taken out to sell, are not junk goods.

zh: 我联系卖家，卖家说了一大堆的理由，还埋怨当初不应该买他们的东西，这样的产品，这样的卖家，这样的售后服务，以后谁还敢在亚马逊上买东西。
en: I got in touch with the vendor, who gave me a long list of excuses for why I shouldn't have bought their goods and lamented that no one would ever dare to purchase anything from them in the future on Amazon with such products, sellers, and after-sales service.

zh: 总之我建议不要跟此卖家买东西，买了也是垃圾东西。
en: To put it briefly, I advise against purchasing anything from this seller because it is also junk.

zh: 亚马逊发货问题
en: Shipping issues with Amazon

zh: 收到货后检查发现：
en: After receiving the products, investigation showed that:

zh: 1、表包装严重破旧。
en: 1, The table packaging is severely deteriorated.

zh: 2、表说明书有严重使用褶皱。
en: 2, The watch's instruction manual has significant use wrinkles.

zh: 3、表不走，台灯充电也无发使用，无法调整时间。
en: 3, Because the watch does not function and the desk lamp is not used to charge it, the time cannot be altered.

zh: 4、分别联系亚马逊客服，只能自费邮寄至美国，后补邮费。
en: 4, Contact Amazon customer support individually, and you can only mail to the United States at your own expense, with postage reimbursed later.

zh: 5、2分的原因是客服服务还不错。
en: 5, 2 points because customer service is not subpar.

zh: 只能说还凑合
en: All I can say is that it isn't bad

zh: 时间不是非常准，每天约快一秒，用了才几个月已经快两分多了。
en: Only a few months have seen speeds more than two minutes, and time is not very accurate, moving forward by around a second per day.

zh: 以前用过一块西铁城的，感觉一两年也不会差几秒。
en: I've used Citizen previously, and I believe that it won't lag behind by a few seconds in a year or two.

zh: 万年历功能倒是蛮不错，计时功能有点鸡肋，基本用不到，偶尔会误触进入计时模式。
en: While the timing function is a bit bland and hardly ever utilized, the perpetual calendar function is pretty wonderful, on occasion, it will unintentionally switch to timing mode.

zh: 太阳能运动手表
en: solar-powered sports watch

zh: 优点：太阳能充电不用担心须更换电池、具备世界时间、多种闹铃及整点提醒。
en: Benefits: world time, a variety of alarms, and full point reminders, solar charging eliminates the need to worry about replacing the battery.

zh: 不足：镜面容易划伤、进灰尘。
en: Shortcomings: The mirror surface is vulnerable to dust buildup and scratches.

zh: 性价比：国内一般价格在220-300之间，海外购到手180多（用时1周左右）。
en: Value for money: While it costs, on average, between 220 and 300 in China, it may be acquired for more than 180 abroad (with about 1 week).

zh: 很满意的手表
en: Very pleased with the watch

zh: 肯定是正品，去专柜验过货，表的外观很漂亮，做工精细，用料足，加上又是进口机械机芯，所以是有一定的分量的，是那些三四百所谓的机械表不能比的，这个是货真价实的。
en: It has to be genuine, I went to the desk to inspect the merchandise, the watch has a lovely aesthetic, superb craftsmanship, adequate materials, and an imported mechanical movement, so it has weight, those three or four hundred so-called mechanical watches are inoperable, by the way, this is the real deal.

zh: 表的走时是很准的，误差完全在可接受范围内，表的包装里有珠宝鉴定证书，表盘的12字那里是真钻石，这个自己戴很合适，作为礼品送出去也很有面子。
en: The watch's trip time is extremely accurate, and its error is entirely within acceptable bounds, the 12 on the dial is a genuine diamond, and a certificate of jewelry appraisal is included with the watch, both as a present and as something you may wear by yourself, this is excellent.

zh: 宾利表确实不错。
en: The timepieces made by Bentley are excellent.

zh: 有史以来体验最差的一次购物
en: One of the worst buying experiences I've ever had

zh: 9月23日晚上老婆手机摔了，心血来潮立马来亚马逊订购了一台8p，有货但是不是自营的且没有加价（心里暗喜），由于不是自营的发货比较慢，系统显示预计最晚收货要到9月27日。
en: My wife dropped her phone on the night of September 23rd, I ordered an 8p from Amazon on the spur of the moment, It was available, but it was not self-operated, and there was no price increase (I was secretly relieved), because non-self-operated delivery is relatively delayed, the system indicates that it is expected to be the most recent, the delivery date is September 27th.

zh: 老婆没手机用难受死了，第二天一早6点多叫我在想想办法，后来上京东一看256G有货可以当天送到，只得立马再订购一台。
en: My wife felt really uncomfortable with the absence of a mobile phone, I was requested to come up with a solution the next morning at 6:00 am Later, I returned to Jingdong and saw that the 256G was in stock and could be delivered the same day, so I ordered another one right away.

zh: 新的买好了，就想着马上把亚马逊的订单给取消。
en: I planned to cancel the Amazon order as soon as I purchased the new one.

zh: 由于订单是半夜下的，没可能凌晨来收快递，7点多打给客服要求取消订单，客服答复已经取消请等待短信通知。
en: Because the order was placed in the middle of the night, the courier could not arrive in the early morning, I called customer service after 7 o'clock and requested that the order be cancelled, the customer support representative said that it has been canceled, and to wait for the SMS message.

zh: 好吧，我就耐心的等着，到了中午上手机一看，订单还在状态还处于未发货，就立马联系客服要求赶快取消订单，客服答复已经操作OK。
en: So I simply waited patiently, when I checked my phone at midday, the order was still in the status and had not been delivered, I immediately contacted the customer service and requested that the order be canceled as quickly as possible, customer service responded that the operation was well.

zh: 到了下午3点上手机一看订单还在，没办法只能再次联系客服明确告知已经第三次来电了，请取消订单并通知卖家务必不要发货！
en: I checked the order on my phone at 3:00 pm and saw that it was still there, I had no alternative but to contact the customer support again to inform them that this was the third call, please cancel the order and notify the seller that it will not be shipped!

zh: 客服在我要求下当场联系了卖家，并告知我卖家不熟悉系统，要等熟悉系统后再操作取消订单。
en: At my request, customer support contacted the seller on the spot and informed me that the seller is unfamiliar with the system and will cancel the order once he becomes acquainted with it.

zh: 但是明确告诉我卖家已经知道了，绝对不会发货的请放心。
en: But please reassure me that the seller is aware and will never ship if you can.

zh: 等到周一我再看订单显示，竟然已经发货了，我也是无语了。
en: I was in awe when I noticed that the purchase had already been dispatched when I checked the order display on Monday.

zh: 由于无法直接联系卖家，只能再次致电客服。
en: I can only phone customer service since I can't get in touch with the merchant directly.

zh: 后面的处理简直无语，基本都是我说一步，客服才接着操作一下。
en: After that, I'm just at a loss for words, in essence, I say do this action, and customer service will continue to operate.

zh: 订单到目前为止还是处于派件拒收状态，正准备再次派送！
en: The order is getting ready to send it again and is currently still in the delivery refusal phase!

zh: 亚马逊难道不会主动跟进下吗？
en: Wouldn't Amazon go out of their way to follow up?

zh: 卖家公司反正也收了钱不跟进也无所谓了。
en: It makes no difference if the seller's company has already collected the money and does not follow up.

zh: 总结下以后大件绝对不会预付钱了，这个样子太麻烦了。
en: To summarize, there will never again be prepayment for huge products, this is really too bothersome.

zh: 看起来很美好
en: Good looking

zh: 很久以前就看中这个摄像头了，但是因为除了价格外，还有一些别的原因，所以没有购买，这次因为凑包邮，价格也还可以所以就买了。
en: This camera has long since captured my heart, but I have refrained from purchasing it for reasons other than the cost, this time, I purchased it because it came with free shipping and the pricing was reasonable.

zh: 买来之后其他的都没什么问题，就是在软件连接的时候，怎么都连不上，我家是TP的路由器，上网查了之后发现好多人都有这个问题，弄了两个多小时，各种改路由器的设置，最后我用360WIFI作为媒介给弄好的，期间给小米客服打电话，他们对这个问题也没有什么解决方法，直接就让我联系亚马逊进行售后。
en: Other things were fine once I got it, but when the program was connected, I was unable to connect, a TP router is at my house, I discovered after searching the Internet that this issue affects a lot of people, more than two hours later, I made several adjustments, in the end, I configured the router using 360WIFI as the medium, during that time, I called Xiaomi customer service, but they didn't have an answer for this issue, they merely instructed me to get in touch with Amazon for customer support.

zh: 另外一点值得注意的就是我在网上看到用户的评论说，这个摄像头支持的存储卡最小是8G，存储容量更小的就不能识别，希望大家注意这点。
en: A further aspect worth mentioning is that, according to user comments I read online, the least memory card supported by this camera is 8G, and memory cards with a smaller storage capacity cannot be detected, I hope everyone is paying attention to this.

zh: 用起来感觉还可以吧，画面还可以接受，但声音音质很差，机器有一定程度的发热，一直开启的话，感觉这种程度的发热有点让人难以接受。
en: It's comfortable to use, the picture is good, but the sound quality is bad and the machine gets hot, if it is always switched on, it feels as if this level of heat is intolerable.

zh: 综上所述，本产品还有诸多不足，希望大家买的时候要慎重。
en: To summarize, this product still has numerous flaws, and I hope you would be cautious while purchasing it.

zh: 之所以给3星，是因为这个是和人生的初恋买的，交往了快3年，就这样于去年离我而去了，一直到现在。
en: Due to the fact that I purchased it with my first love in my life, I gave it 3 stars, after almost 3 years of dating, he abruptly broke up with me last year and has not returned.

zh: 之所以给3星，是因为这个是和人生的初恋买的，现在不知道用到什么程度了，或许扔掉了吧！
en: I gave it 3 stars since I bought it with my first love in my life and now I'm not sure how much I've used it, so maybe toss it away!

zh: 交往了快3年，就这样于去年离我而去了，到现在一想起她，就心痛的想要离开这个世界，人生中第一个女人，带给我一辈子的阴影和心痛，迄今还没能走出来。
en: Almost 3 years of romance, so she left me last year, and now when I think of her, I want to quit the world, the first lady in my life, given me a lifetime of darkness and pain, and I have not been able to get out of it so far.

zh: 买这个手机的时候，想想两个当时感觉，还是能一起同甘共苦，但现在却是不堪回首，人生或许就是这样吧，有些人一辈子都不想遇到，有些事儿一辈子都不想知道，可是有什么办法呢？
en: I considered how the two felt at the time I got this cell phone, I could still join in their pleasures and sufferings, but I am unable to do so at this time, perhaps this is how life is, some people don't want to meet in their lifetime, and some things don't want to know in their lifetime, but what can be done?

zh: 多少次一看到三星这个手机，脑海就想起她，那种痛苦就随之而来灌满全身，我从没舍得用过超过2千元的手机，可是买给她的时候，却毫不犹豫，对一个人再好，可是有天当她变心了，所有的山盟海誓也就烟消云散了。
en: How many times have I seen a Samsung mobile phone and thought about her, and the agony has filled my entire body? I was never willing to use a phone worth more than 2,000 yuan, but I didn't hesitate when I bought it for her, no matter how nice you are to someone, when she changes her mind one day, all the promises will disappear.

zh: 国产品牌中的精品
en: The top national brands

zh: 华为是国货中的精品。
en: Huawei is the best of national products.

zh: 低调的老总和企业，靠的是技术和质量取胜来赢得客户，这跟当下靠广告运作来提高知名度的营商风气截然不同！
en: Unlike the current corporate climate, which depends on promotion to grow popularity, low-key CEOs and businesses win clients through technology and quality!

zh: 没有实力的企业根本不可能做到这样，也不敢这么做！
en: This is difficult for a corporation lacking in strength, and it would be foolish to attempt it!

zh: 正是源于此，我才选择了华为。
en: I decided on Huawei because of this.

zh: 买来用了半年多了，感觉一直很好，非常不错。
en: Since I purchased it more than six months ago, it continues to feel excellent all the time, very good.

zh: 之所以没有给满分，是因为有一次在用它的离线导航时，出现了不定位现象，我最终没有找出原因，其他时候都很好。
en: It was fine, but I didn't give it a perfect score because there was a non-location occurrence once when I was using its offline navigation, and I never did figure out why.

zh: 而且它的在线输入好了目的地，搜索之后自动设计出路线，离开wifi出发以后，它自动离线导航的功能很实用，不用跑流量，它直接跟卫星对话来实现定位及导航，非常好！
en: Additionally, it has entered the destination online and, after searching, creates the route automatically, after disconnecting from the Wi-Fi, its automated offline navigation feature is very helpful since it instantly communicates with the satellite to achieve positioning and navigation without having to navigate through traffic, which is excellent!

zh: 索尼大法好
en: Sony's great approach is effective

zh: 索尼的这种低端机，设计感依旧十足，而且价格便宜，屏幕够大，续航力一级棒，给老人使用很合适。
en: Sony's entry-level phone still has a solid sense of design, is reasonably priced, has a sizable screen, and has exceptional battery life, the elderly will benefit much from it.

zh: 虽然时间已经过去很久了，但这机器依旧没什么毛病。
en: Even though time has gone, this machine is still in perfect working order.

zh: 不过因为我的Z2下放了，所以这台手机也完成了使命。
en: But as my Z2 is decentralized, this phone's task has also been accomplished.
